title: Science Instructional Design Strategies for Linking Non-Formal Education and OER

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of elementary science education and instructional design principles
context.additional_context: Strengthening preservice/in-service teachers' capacity to understand informal science education environments and develop instructional designs using OER

learning_goals: Learners can describe the characteristics of non-formal education and the educational potential of OER (Open Educational Resources).
Learners can develop instructional design models applying OER in the science field.
Learners design OER-based class activities considering learners' cultural and environmental contexts.
Learners develop assessment tools to measure the effectiveness of non-formal education programs.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
